description:
This game is a work in progress. It may or may not change over time or release as a final product. Purchase only if you are comfortable with the current state of the unfinished game.

Young Suns is a 1-4 player narrative life sim set on Jupiter in an optimistic alternative future, intended for one-to-two hours of daily play, alone or with friends.

Build your home among the stars, and take it with you on adventures!

FOLLOW OUR DEVELOPMENT‚ÄîA GAME THAT GROWS ALONGSIDE YOU

üë∑üèΩ Young Suns is still in early, active development. Playing the game now is recommended only for players interested in following the game‚Äôs development, participating in the community, and contributing feedback and suggestions. 

üßëüèΩ‚Äçüè≠ While core features are present, many you'd expect are still in development, and some content‚Äîespecially quest content‚Äîis missing. Even in this state, the game is playable and fun for its intended pattern of play: checking in on a world for an hour or two a day, slowly building up your perfect ship-home, and making new friends among the stars.

üóìÔ∏è To follow our update roadmap, learn more about the game‚Äôs development, and join the community for support & feedback please visit www.youngsuns.com.

BE YOURSELF AMONG THE STARS‚ÄîHELP BUILD A FUTURE FOR EVERYONE

The people of Jupiter are newly free, and they‚Äôve entrusted you with your very own ship. There‚Äôs a lot of work to be done, if we want to make this a better world! Visit planetoids, ruins, and stations with a crew of up to three friends, or entirely on your own. Take on quests from the friendly citizens of Jupiter. Decorate and customize your spaceship. Build relationships with a huge cast of lovable characters, and help rebuild & improve society, for everyone.

KEY FEATURES

‚óå 30 FULLY REALIZED CHARACTERS, with unique looks, behaviors and over 2 months of unique daily chats. Learn their stories, and help with the many problems faced by the people of Jupiter.

‚óå CREATE YOUR CHARACTER and alter any aspect of your look during play‚Äîcharacter creation is only the beginning. Recolor clothing to match your style.

‚óå YOUR SHIP IS YOUR HOME. Personalize your spaceship with 80+ discoverable recipes and items. Paint the walls, stack your shelves‚Äîcreate your perfect cozy nest.

‚óå THAT‚ÄôS NOT JUNK, IT‚ÄôS TREASURE! Find and repair damaged furniture, clothing and tools. Use them yourself, gift them, or donate them to the common cause.

‚óå GROW AND THRIVE. Upgrade your tools to perform harder jobs. Improve and expand your ship. 

‚óå OPEN WORLD EXPLORATION. Fly your ship to fantastical planetoids, derelict ruins, and converted space stations on your journey through a newly-reclaimed region of Jovian space.

‚óå SPACE IS BEAUTIFUL. Featuring a dynamic fully-composed soundtrack, gorgeous colorful visuals, and deep, characterful writing.

Full details on the latest status of the game, how you can give feedback and report issues can be found at www.youngsuns.com.
shortDescription:
This game is a work in progress. It may or may not change over time or release as a final product. Purchase only if you are comfortable with the current state of the unfinished game.

Young Suns is a 1-4 player narrative life sim set on Jupiter, in an optimistic alternative future. Visit planetoids, ruins, and stations. Decorate and customize your own spaceship. Help the citizens of Jupiter make society better!
title: Young Suns (Game Preview)
